Class ItemStateEnumProperties | Methods | Constants
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.model
Classpublic class ItemStateEnum
InheritanceItemStateEnum AbstractEnum

An Enumeration of ItemStateEnum. One of ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or DELETED. You can set this property only to ACTIVE or INACTIVE; you cannot delete a video by setting its itemState to DELETED.
